name: Colours (Designed By Jonas)
description:
Colours is a fast paced isometric combat arena game. players have to face off against each other in a closed level with the goal of defeating the other player. The game was awarded the Best Games Project at SAE Institute Dubai's Student showcase in December 2019.

The game was made alongside two other game developers (Juma Alremeithi & Joel Thomas) to test our ability to work in a collaborative environment. My role on the project was primarily creating the 3D Art for the game as well as designing the user interface. All members of the team were required to write the documentation and code for the game.

Game Controls

Navigation (Main Menu):

Up - W / Up Arrow Key

Down - S / Down Arrow Key

Click Option - Enter Key

Navigation (Player Select):

Up - W / Up Arrow Key

Down - S / Down Arrow Key

Click Option - Enter Key

Return to Previous Menu - Escape Key

Navigation (Credits):

Return to Main Menu - Escape Key

In-Game Controls (Player 1):

Move Character Up - W

Move Character Down - S

Rotate Character Left - A

Rotate Character Right - D

Fire Projectile - C Key

In-Game Controls (Player 2):

Move Character Up - Up Arrow Key

Move Character Down - Down Arrow Key

Rotate Character Left - Left Arrow Key

Rotate Character Right - Right Arrow Key

Fire Projectile - M Key
